name: margie mayfield
text: We already own a peloton bike but wanted to see if they sold other seats. Great customer service. Answered all of our questions and gave us some wonderful tips. Birmingham Pelton thanks for your help and for your great staff’s attitude and willingness to help!

name: L T
text: If you reopen but it's by appointment only add that to your hours of operation. To avoid individuals from driving all the way over there and can't enter, a complete waste of time and gas!

name: Justina Swartz
text: Peloton Birmingham Rocks!  Their customer service is exceptional.   Special shout out to Brandon Dabbs who helped us every step of the way up to and including post-delivery.  We love our new Tread.

name: Judy Oney
text: Absolutely love this place and the staff here! The manager Cruz is extremely professional and outgoing! He and his staff are so knowledgeable about the products and are quick to answer any questions you have! HIGHLY recommend this store and their products!
